answers.answer: I've never heard of this drug - is it an OTC or does it require a script?  You might try asking your question on the Weight Loss Alternatives forum - someone there might be able to help.Otherwise, keep researching and talk to your doctor.
I just did a quick search and it appears that vomiting and nausea are the main side effects.It doesn't appear that there are very many countries, in which the drug is approved.

Hi, I have actually tried Accomplia and it worked great for me, I didn't want to eat anything and had no side effects. The only problem is finding it. The site I ordered from no longer carries it. Good Luck! Let me know if you find it anywhere.ChelleK

Hi, I have not heard of this but what would worry me is what happens when you stop taking the drug? My experience has been drugs and other fad diets are great for the short term but unless you change your life style the moment you stop using them the weight goes back on.I found the best way to lose weight is with a healthy balance of food and exercise. this works slower than the quick fix, but will last a life time,Good luck with your journey

question: I have found drug for weight control, but d't know about side effets...Can you help me???Text from site www.da-med.comAcomplia is used for weight loss, may also be used for treatment of overweight patients who suffer from Type 2 diabetes and abnormal fat levels in the blood. It works by blocking specific receptors in the brain and fat tissues called CB1 receptors. Use Acomplia together with a reduced calorie diet and exercise. Acomplia also improves cholesterol and triglyceride levels.it stay there http://da-med.com/product/acomplia-zimulti.html
title: Can we help me with ACOMPLIA
